TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoadItemsEventHandler(object sender, LoadItemsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoadItemsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub LoadItemsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As LoadItemsEventArgs)
public delegate void LoadItemsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, LoadItemsEventArgs ^ e);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的來源，即 控制項。

span.span: The source of the event, a control.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清單控制項包含項目的集合。A list control contains a collection of items. 這些項目屬於類別。These items are of the class. 清單控制項時提供預設呈現，代表由其屬性。When providing default rendering, the list control represents a by its property. 在樣板化轉譯中，範本可能會造成的任何所需的屬性或相關聯的資料繫結物件。In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a or associated data-bound object. 如果項目是資料繫結至物件就會引發事件。If an item is data-bound to a object, the event is raised. 在這個階段中，此處理常式可以設定的屬性任意的運算式中的物件。At this time, the handler can set properties of the object from arbitrary expressions. 當您建立委派控制項，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 產生項目事件時，控制項告知處理常式。The control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
